title: AumAI Agent Error Taxonomy
description: Canonical error taxonomy for all AumAI agents. Uses 3-digit numeric codes grouped by category (1xx-6xx). Enables structured error handling, routing, and observability across heterogeneous agent deployments.

error_instance.title: AgentErrorInstance
error_instance.description: A single structured error emitted by an agent at runtime.

code.description: Numeric error code from the AumAI taxonomy.

category.description: High-level category matching the code's hundreds digit.

recoverable.description: Whether the agent can self-recover without human intervention.

agent_id.description: ID of the agent that emitted this error.

run_id.description: Run/session ID in which the error occurred.

step_index.description: Zero-based index of the execution step where the error occurred.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the error was recorded.

context.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs providing additional diagnostic context.

cause.description: Serialized upstream exception or error chain.

retry_after_seconds.description: Suggested back-off before retrying, if applicable.

description: Top-level taxonomy document listing all defined error codes.

category_name.description: Short machine-readable name for the category.

code_prefix.description: Hundreds prefix for all codes in this category (1-6).

description.description: Human-readable description of what errors belong to this category.

name.description: SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE symbolic name for the error.

retry_strategy.description: Recommended retry strategy when this error is encountered.

categories.description: Errors occurring during agent planning and goal decomposition

errors.name: GOAL_DECOMPOSITION_FAILED
errors.description: Agent failed to decompose the high-level goal into executable sub-tasks
errors.example_message: Could not decompose goal 'schedule meeting' into steps after 3 attempts
